Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 A VARCHAR2(5000);
 
BEGIN

A := GET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('DBLK_SALES_INVOICE_DETAIL',QUERY_DATA_SOURCE_NAME) ;
INSERT INTO TEMP_REPORT_ERRORS(REPORT_NAME,ERROR_STRING)
VALUES ('SAL INV FORM SOURCE NAME',A);
A := GET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('DBLK_SALES_INVOICE_DETAIL',DEFAULT_WHERE) ;
INSERT INTO TEMP_REPORT_ERRORS(REPORT_NAME,ERROR_STRING)
VALUES ('SAL INV FORM DEFAULT WHERE ',A);

COMMIT;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: WHEN_VALIDATE
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE WHEN_VALIDATE IS

 RET VARCHAR2(500);
 A NUMBER;
 EXP EXCEPTION;
 PLIST PARAMLIST;
 
 ID1 NUMBER(5);
 ID2 NUMBER(5);
 ID3 NUMBER(5);
 ID4 NUMBER(5);
 ID5 NUMBER(5);
 ID6 NUMBER(5);
 ID7 NUMBER(5);
 ID8 NUMBER(5);
 ID9 NUMBER(5);
 ID10 NUMBER(5);

BEGIN

IF :TEXT_CODE_COMBINATION_VAL IS NOT NULL THEN
 
 A:=HOW_MANY_CHARS(:TEXT_CODE_COMBINATION_VAL,'-',FALSE);
 
 IF A+1<>:PARAMETER.PARM_NO_OF_SEGMENTS THEN
 RAISE EXP;
 END IF;
 
 RET := IS_VALID_CODE(1,:TEXT_CODE_combination_val);
 IF RET IN ('-1','-2','-3','-4') THEN 
 
 IF RET = '-1' THEN 
 MESSAGE('INVALID SEGMENT NUMBER');
 ELSIF RET = '-2' THEN
 MESSAGE('SEGMENT VALUE NOT FOUND');
 ELSIF RET = '-3' THEN
 MESSAGE('SEGMENT IS PARENT');
 ELSIF RET = '-4' THEN
 MESSAGE('INVALID SEGMENT DEPENDENCY ');
 END IF;
 RAISE EXP; 
 ELSE
 SPLIT_ID_ALL(RET,ID1,ID2,ID3,ID4,ID5,ID6,ID7,ID8,ID9,ID10);
 :DISP_DESCRIPTION:=GET_CODE_VALUE_DESC(:PARAMETER.PARM_STRUCTURE_ID,ID1,ID2,ID3,ID4,ID5,ID6,ID7,ID8,ID9,ID10); 
 :TEXT_CODE_COMBINATION_ID_ALL := RET; 
 END IF;
 
END IF;
 
EXCEPTION
 WHEN EXP THEN

 PLIST :=CREATE_PARAMETER_LIST('PLIST');
 ADD_PARAMETER(PLIST,'STRUCTURE_ID',TEXT_PARAMETER,:PARAMETER.PARM_STRUCTURE_ID);
 CALL_FORM('CODE_ENTRY',NO_HIDE,NO_REPLACE,NO_QUERY_ONLY,SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,PLIST);
 DESTROY_PARAMETER_LIST('PLIST');
 
 IF :GLOBAL.CODE_VALUE IS NOT NULL THEN
 :TEXT_CODE_COMBINATION_VAL := :GLOBAL.CODE_VALUE;
 :DISP_DESCRIPTION := :GLOBAL.CODE_VALUE_DESC;
 :TEXT_CODE_COMBINATION_ID_ALL := :GLOBAL.CODE_ID_ALL;
 ELSE
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END IF;
END;

 
 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: PRO_CODE_ID
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE PRO_CODE_ID IS

 C_ID NUMBER;
 CIDALL VARCHAR2(2000);
 ID1 NUMBER DEFAULT NULL;
 ID2 NUMBER;
 ID3 NUMBER;
 ID4 NUMBER;
 ID5 NUMBER;
 ID6 NUMBER;
 ID7 NUMBER;
 ID8 NUMBER;
 ID9 NUMBER;
 ID10 NUMBER;
 
 TMP NUMBER;
 
BEGIN

IF :TEXT_CODE_COMBINATION_ID_ALL IS NOT NULL THEN
--IF :TEXT_CODE_COMBINATION_VAL IS NULL THEN
-- MESSAGE('IN');
-- :TEXT_CODE_COMBINATION_ID_ALL:=is_valid_code(:parameter.parm_structure_id,:TEXT_CODE_COMBINATION_VAL);
--END IF;


 SELECT CODE_COMBINATION_ID INTO C_ID 
 FROM CODE_COMBINATIONS
 WHERE SEGMENT_ID_ALL=:TEXT_CODE_COMBINATION_ID_ALL;
 
 :TEXT_CODE_COMBINATION_ID := C_ID;
 END IF;

EXCEPTION 
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 CIDALL := :TEXT_CODE_COMBINATION_ID_ALL;
 
 TMP := LENGTH(CIDALL)/5;
 
 FOR CNT IN 1..TMP LOOP
 IF CNT=1 THEN
 ID1 := TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(CIDALL,1,5));
 ELSIF CNT=2 THEN 
 ID2 := TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(CIDALL,6,5));
 ELSIF CNT=3 THEN
 ID3 := TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(CIDALL,11,5));
 ELSIF CNT=4 THEN
 ID4 := TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(CIDALL,16,5));
 ELSIF CNT=5 THEN
 ID5 := TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(CIDALL,21,5));
 ELSIF CNT=6 THEN
 ID6 := TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(CIDALL,26,5));
 ELSIF CNT=7 THEN
 ID7 := TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(CIDALL,31,5));
 ELSIF CNT=8 THEN
 ID8 := TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(CIDALL,36,5));
 ELSIF CNT=9 THEN
 ID9 := TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(CIDALL,41,5));
 ELSIF CNT=10 THEN
 ID10 := TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(CIDALL,46,5));
 END IF;
 END LOOP;


 INSERT INTO CODE_COMBINATIONS(STRUCTURE_ID,SEGMENT_ID01,SEGMENT_ID02,SEGMENT_ID03,SEGMENT_ID04,SEGMENT_ID05,SEGMENT_ID06,SEGMENT_ID07,SEGMENT_ID08,SEGMENT_ID09,SEGMENT_ID10,EFFECTIVE_FROM_DATE,ALLOW_BUDGET_YN,ALLOW_POST_YN)
 VALUES(:PARAMETER.PARM_STRUCTURE_ID,ID1,ID2,ID3,ID4,ID5,ID6,ID7,ID8,ID9,ID10,SYSDATE,1,1);
 
 SELECT CODE_COMBINATION_ID INTO C_ID 
 FROM CODE_COMBINATIONS
 WHERE SEGMENT_ID_ALL=:TEXT_CODE_COMBINATION_ID_ALL;
 
 :TEXT_CODE_COMBINATION_ID := C_ID;
WHEN OTHERS THEN
 MESSAGE(ERROR_TEXT); 
 MESSAGE(ERROR_CODE); 
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE

 RET VARCHAR2(500);
 A NUMBER;
 EXP EXCEPTION;
 PLIST PARAMLIST;
 
 ID1 NUMBER(5);
 ID2 NUMBER(5);
 ID3 NUMBER(5);
 ID4 NUMBER(5);
 ID5 NUMBER(5);
 ID6 NUMBER(5);
 ID7 NUMBER(5);
 ID8 NUMBER(5);
 ID9 NUMBER(5);
 ID10 NUMBER(5);

BEGIN

IF :TEXT_CODE_COMBINATION_VAL IS NOT NULL THEN
 
 A:=HOW_MANY_CHARS(:TEXT_CODE_COMBINATION_VAL,'-',FALSE);
 
 IF A+1<>:PARAMETER.PARM_NO_OF_SEGMENTS THEN
 RAISE EXP;
 END IF;
 
 RET := IS_VALID_CODE(1,:TEXT_CODE_combination_val);
 IF RET IN ('-1','-2','-3','-4') THEN 
 
 IF RET = '-1' THEN 
 MESSAGE('INVALID SEGMENT NUMBER');
 ELSIF RET = '-2' THEN
 MESSAGE('SEGMENT VALUE NOT FOUND');
 ELSIF RET = '-3' THEN
 MESSAGE('SEGMENT IS PARENT');
 ELSIF RET = '-4' THEN
 MESSAGE('INVALID SEGMENT DEPENDENCY ');
 END IF;
 RAISE EXP; 
 ELSE
 SPLIT_ID_ALL(RET,ID1,ID2,ID3,ID4,ID5,ID6,ID7,ID8,ID9,ID10);
 :DISP_DESCRIPTION:=GET_CODE_VALUE_DESC(:PARAMETER.PARM_STRUCTURE_ID,ID1,ID2,ID3,ID4,ID5,ID6,ID7,ID8,ID9,ID10); 
 :TEXT_CODE_COMBINATION_ID_ALL := RET; 
 END IF;
 
END IF;
 
EXCEPTION
 WHEN EXP THEN

 PLIST :=CREATE_PARAMETER_LIST('PLIST');
 ADD_PARAMETER(PLIST,'STRUCTURE_ID',TEXT_PARAMETER,:PARAMETER.PARM_STRUCTURE_ID);
 CALL_FORM('CODE_ENTRY',NO_HIDE,NO_REPLACE,NO_QUERY_ONLY,SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,PLIST);
 DESTROY_PARAMETER_LIST('PLIST');
 
 IF :GLOBAL.CODE_VALUE IS NOT NULL THEN
 :TEXT_CODE_COMBINATION_VAL := :GLOBAL.CODE_VALUE;
 :DISP_DESCRIPTION := :GLOBAL.CODE_VALUE_DESC;
 :TEXT_CODE_COMBINATION_ID_ALL := :GLOBAL.CODE_ID_ALL;
 ELSE
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END IF;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: PCKG_FORM
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PACKAGE BODY pckg_form IS

PROCEDURE POPULATE_TABLE IS 

 LOOP_COUNTER NUMBER:=1;
 
 lnum_curr_rec NUMBER:=:SYSTEM.CURSOR_RECORD;
 lnum_top_rec NUMBER:=GET_BLOCK_PROPERTY(:SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK,TOP_RECORD); 
 
 lvch_cur_itm VARCHAR2(500):=:SYSTEM.CURSOR_ITEM;
 
BEGIN

 SET_FORM_PROPERTY(:SYSTEM.CURSOR_FORM,VALIDATION_UNIT,FORM_SCOPE);
 FIRST_RECORD;
 
 FOR CNT IN 1..TMP_TABLE.COUNT LOOP
 TMP_TABLE(CNT).CODE_COMB_VAL:='';
 END LOOP;
 CLEAR_MESSAGE;
 LOOP
 IF LOOP_COUNTER<>lnum_curr_rec THEN
 TMP_TABLE(LOOP_COUNTER).CODE_COMB_VAL:=:TEXT_CODE_COMBINATION_VAL; 
 END IF;
 LOOP_COUNTER:=LOOP_COUNTER+1; 
 
 EXIT WHEN :SYSTEM.LAST_RECORD='TRUE';

 NEXT_RECORD;

 END LOOP;
 CLEAR_MESSAGE;
 GO_RECORD(lnum_curr_rec);
 GO_ITEM(lvch_cur_itm);
 
 IF GET_BLOCK_PROPERTY(:SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK,TOP_RECORD) <> lnum_top_rec THEN
 GO_RECORD(lnum_top_rec);
 
 FOR CNT IN 1..(lnum_curr_rec - lnum_top_rec) LOOP
 NEXT_RECORD;
 END LOOP;
 END IF; 

 SET_FORM_PROPERTY(:SYSTEM.CURSOR_FORM,VALIDATION_UNIT,DEFAULT_SCOPE);

END POPULATE_TABLE;


FUNCTION CHECK_PRIMARY_KEY(KEY_TO_CHECK VARCHAR2) RETURN BOOLEAN 
IS

BEGIN
 FOR CNT IN 1..TMP_TABLE.COUNT LOOP
 
 IF TMP_TABLE(CNT).CODE_COMB_VAL=KEY_TO_CHECK THEN
 RETURN(FALSE);
 END IF;
 
 END LOOP; 
 
 RETURN(TRUE);

END CHECK_PRIMARY_KEY;
END pckg_form;

ProgramUnit.Name: PCKG_FORM
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PACKAGE pckg_form IS
 
 type rec is record(CODE_COMB_VAL VARCHAR2(500));
 type tab is table of rec index by binary_integer;
 
 TMP_TABLE tab;
 
 PROCEDURE POPULATE_TABLE;
 FUNCTION CHECK_PRIMARY_KEY(KEY_TO_CHECK VARCHAR2) RETURN BOOLEAN;
END pckg_form;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-MOUSE-DOUBLECLICK
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :PARAMETER.PARM_MODE = PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_ADD_MODE 
 OR 
 :PARAMETER.PARM_MODE = PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_EDIT_MODE
 OR 
 :PARAMETER.PARM_MODE = PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_FIND_MODE then 
 
 PCKG_ACCOUNT_CODE_HELP.PRO_account_CODE_HELP(:PARAMETER.PARM_STRUC_COST_CENTER,:CC_CODE_COMB_ID,:CC_CODE_ID_ALL,:DISP_CODE_VALUE,:CC_CODE_DESC);
 

end if ;
